pages.text: Every Handle contributes damage, cooldown rate, mana cost, and crit chance to the crafted wand.

pages.title: Gold Ingot
pages.description: Gold is the most common wand handle.

pages.title: Iron Ingot
pages.description: Iron is the second most common wand handle.

pages.title: Shulker Shell
pages.description: Shulker Shells are the most rare wand handle.

pages.title: Leather
pages.description: Leather is the handle wrap of choice for those who are closer to the natural world.

pages.title: Kelp
pages.description: Kelp wraps are inexpensive and tap into the Ocean's natural magics.
